Topic.Title: Any idea what the Quest 4.0 release date (roughly) is?

Posts.EditableText: Same as topic I guess any reply is welcome, even if it isn't accurate.
Posts.HTML: Same as topic I guess any reply is welcome, even if it isn't accurate.

Posts.EditableText: I couldn't even guess. It depends on entirely on the speed at which things get done - which varies from incredibly slowly, to rather quickly. Given the huge number of things I have planned, there will probably be a 3.6 release before a 4.0.
Posts.HTML: I couldn't even guess. It depends on entirely on the speed at which things get done - which varies from incredibly slowly, to rather quickly. Given the huge number of things I have planned, there will probably be a 3.6 release before a 4.0.

Posts.EditableText: but remember what i said Alex... i want Quest [b:2pfa6kjz]6.0[/b:2pfa6kjz] for Xmas j/k, no need for 4.0 yet, a few minor bug fixes and small implementations are required. I dont know if Alex has anything big he is putting in, but i cant really see any reason to release 4.0
